front.title: Tetrys, an On-the-Fly Network Coding Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes Tetrys, an On-The-Fly Network Coding (NC) protocol that MAY be used to transport delay and loss-sensitive data over a lossy network. Tetrys MAY recover from erasures within an RTT-independent delay, thanks to the transmission of Coded Packets. This document is a record of the experience gained by the authors while developing and testing in real conditions the Tetrys protocol. This document is a product of the Coding for Efficient Network Communications Research Group (NWCRG). It conforms to the NWCRG taxonomy[RFC8406].
